Fighting Style (Archery): +2 ranged attacks
Fighting Style (Defense): +1 AC in armor
Improved Combat Superiority: Use d12 Superiority Dice
Improved War Magic: Bonus attack after any spell
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Action Surge: Take an extra action 2/short rest
Combat Superiority: Use 6d12 Superiority Dice to perform 9 chosen Maneuvers/short rest
Commander's Strike: Forego 1 attack to add Superiority Die to ally attack
Disarming Attack: Add Superiority Die to damage, foe drops item (DC 16 Str neg)
Distracting Strike: Add Superiority Die to damage, next ally attack against same foe in same rd gains Adv
Eldritch Strike: Inflicts Disadv on saves vs. self spells for 1 rd after hit
Evasive Footwork: Add Superiority Die to AC during move
Feinting Attack: Use bonus action to gain Adv on next attack and add Superiority Die to damage
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with single, one-handed weapon
Fighting Style (Great Weapon Fighting): May re-roll 1s and 2s on two-handed weapon damage
Fighting Style (Protection): Use Reaction to impose attack Disadv on adjacent foe attacking ally
Fighting Style (Two-Weapon Fighting): Add ability modifier to second attack damage
Goading Attack: Add Superiority Die to damage, foe attacks on others suffer Disadv (DC 16 Wis neg) for 1 rd
Great Weapon Master: Bonus attack after crit or reducing foe to 0 HP; trade -5 attack w/heavy weapon for +10 damage
Improved Critical: Crit on natural 19
Know Your Enemy: Know how foe compares to self after 1 min study
Lunging Attack: Gain +5' melee range, add Superiority Die to damage
Maneuvering Attack: Add Superiority Die to damage, ally can react to move half speed w/no OA from target
Menacing Attack: Add Superiority Die to damage, foe frightened (DC 16 Wis neg) for 1 rd
Parry: Reduce damage from foe by Superiority Die + 1
Polearm Master: Bonus attack w/polearm butt inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning, OA when foe enters reach
Precision Attack: Add Superiority Die to attack
Pushing Attack: Add Superiority Die to damage, push foe 15' (DC 16 Str neg)
Rally: Chosen ally gains Superiority Die + 2 temporary HP
Relentless: Minimum 1 Superiority Die after initiative
Riposte: Use bonus to attack after foe miss, add Superiority Die to damage
Savage Attacker: Take best of two melee damage rolls 1/tn
Second Wind: Regain 1d10+20 HP 1/short rest
Superior Critical: Crit on natural 18
Survivor: Regain 6 HP each tn when between 1 and 45 HP
Sweeping Attack: After hit, inflict Superiority Die HP on adjacent foe
Trip Attack: Add Superiority Die to damage, knock foe prone (DC 16 Str neg)
War Magic: Bonus attack after any spell
Weapon Bond: Cannot be disarmed, can summon weapon
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength

Save Notes: Indomitable: May re-roll failed save 3/long rest
